item.title: I-9 and E-Verify functionality degraded
item.content:encoded:
[High] - E-Verify API Service Outage

Summary: The E-Verify API service is currently experiencing an outage, impacting I-9 workflows. The company is working on resolving the issue.

Jan 23, 12:12 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 23, 12:11 PST
Monitoring - We’re experiencing a service outage with the E-Verify API. I-9 workflows will be impacted until the E-Verify API service is restored. We apologize for any inconvenience.

item.title: Performance Degradation in US-2 Region
item.content:encoded:
Nov 3, 15:12 PDT
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the performance issues in the US-2 region have been resolved. We thank you for your patience during this time.

Nov 3, 09:30 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue causing general slowness in the US-2 region. Users may experience delayed responses. Our team is actively working to resolve this as quickly as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience.

item.title: Performance Degradation in US-2 Region

Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue causing general slowness in the US-2 region. Users may experience delayed responses. Our team is actively working to resolve this as quickly as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience.

item.title: Processing Delay in Background Jobs (US-2 Region)
item.content:encoded:
Oct 27, 17:41 PDT
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the earlier reported issue regarding the widespread delay in processing background jobs in the US-2 region has now been successfully resolved.

We appreciate your patience and understanding during this time and apologize for any inconvenience caused. Thank you for your continued support.

Oct 27, 13:49 PDT
Investigating - We are currently experiencing a widespread delay in processing background jobs in the US-2 region. Our team is working to resolve this issue. During this time, users in US-2 region may encounter longer than usual wait times for updates via webhooks.

For those utilizing an SMS consent system dependent on webhooks, please be aware that you may experience errors or delays in loading status updates until this issue is fully resolved.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your patience as we work to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Stay tuned for further updates.

item.title: Applicant table / UAV functionality degraded
item.content:encoded:
Oct 10, 19:28 PDT
Resolved - The incident has been resolved. We will continue to monitor for any additional disruptions.

Oct 10, 19:08 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented, UAV & applicant table functionality is back to normal. We will be closely monitoring the service.

Oct 10, 18:48 PDT
Update - Our team is still working on the fix, UAV and applicant table are currently down.

Oct 10, 17:43 PDT
Identified - The issue has been identified and we are working on a fix.

Oct 10, 17:42 PDT
Investigating - We are currently experiencing service degradation affecting applicant table / UAV on us-2.fountain.com. Our technical team is actively investigating the issue.
We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. We appreciate your patience.

item.title: Analytics Service Degradation
item.content:encoded:
Sep 18, 14:28 PDT
Resolved - We're pleased to inform you that the previously reported service degradation has been successfully resolved. Our platform is now fully operational, and all services are functioning as expected.

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and appreciate your patience and understanding throughout the incident. Our team will continue to monitor the situation to ensure consistent performance.

Sep 18, 12:49 PDT
Identified - We have successfully identified the root cause of the service degradation affecting analytics. Our technical team is now working diligently to address and rectify the problem.

Thank you for your patience as we work towards a resolution.

Sep 18, 12:09 PDT
Investigating - We are currently experiencing a service degradation affecting analytics. Our technical team is actively investigating the issue to resolve it as quickly as possible.
We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Your patience and understanding are greatly appreciated.

Aug 17, 10:32 PDT
Investigating - We are currently observing performance issues in one of our service regions, leading to a temporary degradation in service quality for some customers. Our technical team is actively working to diagnose and address the situation. We appreciate your patience and understanding.

Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

item.title: Dashboard and Application Disruption
item.content:encoded:
Jun 9, 17:40 PDT
Resolved - The incident has been resolved. We will continue to monitor for any further interruptions.

Jun 9, 17:36 PDT
Monitoring - The vendor has resolved the issue, and system operations have been restored. We are closely monitoring the system.

Jun 9, 16:32 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 9, 16:32 PDT
Investigating - We are currently experiencing a disruption in our dashboard and application functionality. Preliminary investigations indicate that this issue is stemming from an outage with one of our database vendors. Our team is actively investigating the matter to restore normal operations as quickly as possible.

During this incident, the dashboard may not load, and certain parts of the application may not function as intended. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and assure you that we are diligently working to resolve the issue.

Please stay tuned for further updates as we gather more information about the vendor outage and progress in resolving the problem. We appreciate your patience and understanding.

item.title: Intermittent applicant errors
item.content:encoded:
Jun 8, 09:54 PDT
Resolved - We've deployed a fix for this issue and are continuing to monitor for any additional issues

Jun 8, 09:06 PDT
Identified - We've identified the source of the error and are preparing a fix

Jun 8, 08:18 PDT
Investigating - We've investigating reports of intermittent blank screens when loading the Universal Applicant View, Applicant Table, or searching applicants

item.title: Reduced functionality in Analytics
item.content:encoded:
May 31, 12:42 PDT
Resolved - The incident has been resolved. Our analytics integration partner rolled out a change that caught us by surprise. We have now restored functionality, but certain customers might perceive a change in the user interface. In case you have further questions, please reach out to support@fountain.com.

May 31, 10:50 PDT
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

May 31, 07:04 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue with analytics. During the investigation, some customers might experience reduced functionality in the application.
